buildCommand: if cd flutter; then git pull && cd .. ; else git clone https://github.com/RaihanAdityaP/Savora; fi && flutter/bin/flutter doctor && flutter/bin/flutter clean && flutter/bin/flutter config --enable-web && flutter/bin/flutter build web --release && mkdir -p build/web/recipe && cp public/recipe/[id].html build/web/recipe/share.html
